channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The drain looks to be blocked as there is water still coming from it and trickling down the road even though there has been no rainfall today., 19th February
item.description:
The drain pretty much outside Busy Bees Nursery

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 213, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeatedly flooding road from blocked drain, 19th February
item.description:
Drain outside Elm Trees/Barrow Farm is blocked and causing flooding to the road, last looked at a few years ago for the same issue. Subsides ( as in the photos attached) after a few days but as soon as we have any consistent rain the road is flooded around 50% of it's width x around 20 metres in length.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barrow, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 19th February
item.description:
The location is Cleeve Common road on the corner by an access gate to fields. This is a rough piece of road anyway and potholes have now gotten sufficiently large to cause damage to vehicle tyres. There are also further deep potholes at places along this road and where the verge meets the road as well. Please can they be filled in
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Binyon Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe

item.title: Sharp edged pothole and damage to edge of road., 19th February
item.description:
The location is the start of Mill Lane just off Ham Road and along the edge of the Green. As it is in the wheel track of vehicles on a relatively busy road it is constantly being hit so does need repairing please before it damages MY tyres.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drains blocked, 19th February
item.description:
Between Jervase Road and Delavale Road junction, drains on Gretton Road are severely blocked and during the recent heavy rain (with more rain forecast) the water run off from Cider Mill Mill Lane has no where to go, causing a flood across the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ruining grass verge opposite my home, 19th February
item.description:
The house next door (148 Innsworth Lane) have continuously parked there cars on the grass verge opposite there house, causing a grass verge to turn into a mud pit (has been reported multiple times). This has now caused flooding outside my house, mud over the pavement and a health hazard to us all who walk along the pavement. They have now decided to park their car on my grass verge (opposite 150 Innsworth Lane) which is now creating the same problem as above.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
